QuestData.Title: Death to the Witchmother
QuestData.Description: The numberless years of my life have been dedicated to learning and perfecting the arts of healing and restoration.$b$bNothing in this world pains me more than taking a life, traveler.$b$bIt is with a heavy heart that I must commission the death of Magula, the leader of the harpies that threaten this grove.$b$bMay her death save the lives of more noble beings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Has the terrible deed been accomplished, traveler?
QuestData.RewardText: May peace again fill our sacred grove.
